name: Beautiful Snake 1.0
description:
Welcome to the Beautiful Snake game, this game is designed for anyone who want to play a game which acts as a pastime and gives them relaxation by the used music and sound effects

The game has two maps currently in which players can play (it can be selected in the beginning)  :

1) Grasslands

2) Polar Regions

It currently has one mode in which the length of the snake doesn't increase as the traditional snake game, but the speed of the snake gradually increases, and after hitting about 800-1000 score, its really hard and challenging to play it, but we are planning to add the length increasing game mode as well as the traditional snake game, so stay tuned :)

There are 3 snake colors as well which players can choose in the beginning :

1) Blue

2) Green

3) White

Credits :

Game Developed by : Vaibhav Kumar (vaibhavkr)

Map Assets :
 1) Grasslands --> Free Art Backgrounds Library (Website : https://freeartbackgrounds.com)
 2) Polar Regions --> winter PNG designed by : KJPargeterImages (Website : https://pngtree.com)
Sprites & Images :
 Designed by Vaibhav Kumar (Developer)
Musics and Sounds:
        1) Main Music : {Original Name : Oniku Loop2, Music From : DL-Sounds.com}
        2) Apple Eating : {Original Name : Lizard eat insect 2, Sound From : ZAPSPLAT.com}
        3) Button Pressed : {Original Name : User interface pop up tone, high pitched, good for speech bubble or notification alert. Version 4, Sound From : ZAPSPLAT.com}
        4) Positive Tone : {Original Name : Game tone, soft, warm, relaxed watery, positive sound 2, Sound From : ZAPSPLAT.com}
        5) Negative Tone : {Original Name : Game tone, soft, warm, relaxed watery, negative sound 1, Sound From : ZAPSPLAT.com}

You may need to run the game as an administrator to avoid crashes if your installation directory requires administrator access (the default installation directory requires!)!

Hopefully, you will like our game :)
